title: 搞按钮的东西是什么
txt_content: 搞按钮的东西是什么材料

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
2樓正解, 
多參考一下合成表吧...

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content:
[cubblestone]烧制 [furnace]
得到 [stone]

[stone]
[stone] 等于按钮
